mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodPrcResveReg Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ RESVE_REG_SN , GOD_NO , PRC_RESVE_SECT_CD , RESVE_BEG_DT , RESVE_END_DT , REG_ADMIN_ID , APRV_YN , APRV_DT , APRV_ADMIN_ID , APL_YN , APL_DT , APL_ADMIN_ID , RESVE_RTL_PRC , RESVE_CSMR_PRC , RESVE_EMP_PRC , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_PRC_RESVE_REG WHERE 1 = 1 AND RESVE_REG_SN = #{resveRegSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteGodPrcResveReg Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM GOD_PRC_RESVE_REG WHERE 1 = 1 AND RESVE_REG_SN = #{resveRegSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
